annonstext:
At Lifesum, we are improving lives through better eating, and we are doing this using software that is highly personalized for our users’ needs. By tapping into mobile sensor technology and combining it with a passion for design and applied psychology, we create a delightful user experience to help people reach their goals.

We enjoy a vibrant mix of cultures, world views, and working styles, and it's these different perspectives that make sure we're solving the right problems. With over 45 million users worldwide, we need to grow our amazing teams with more brilliant people to keep up with the demand.

We are now looking for an experienced Data Scientist to capture insights from our rich data.

Responsibilities and what you will do:

- Improve the quality of our database and database content
- Create automated reports from complex data
- Find insights from data and deliver creative, pedagogical reports
- Create business cases for new products and services based on data
- Develop and work with models for predictive analysis

Are you the one we're looking for?

To be successful in this position, we believe that you have:

- Degree in an analytical field such as Data Science, Engineering, Mathematics or Statistics

And documented work-life experience of:

- Analyzing and interpreting data
- Using statistical programming languages to manipulate data, draw insights and build models, create data pipelines, dashboards, and reports
- Work with large datasets (i.e., data extraction, cleansing, analysis)
- Statistics, experimental design, data mining, machine learning, and predictive modeling; Hypothesis Testing through Experimentation, A/B testing
- From our ever-changing tool kit: BQ, Looker, Firebase, Python, jupyter notebooks

About Lifesum

We are on the journey to becoming the world’s leading nutrition app, and our employees are at the core of making this happen. The continued growth of our business offers new and interesting challenges and opportunities for all employees, and being part of Lifesum offers exciting experiences going forward.

Lifesum was founded in 2013 and is a Stockholm-based tech startup with offices in both Stockholm and FIRSTNAME LASTNAME. Lifesum creates the number one self-care service for the Millennial Generation and is one of the fastest-growing digital health companies in the world. With millions of global users, Lifesum is a trusted daily companion to help people take control of their eating behavior and live a healthier life.

We consist of employees from all over the world, including more than 25 nationalities, and we enjoy a vibrant mix of cultures, world views, and working styles.

If you think this sounds exciting, we'd love to hear from you and get to know you. Send us your resume right away, tell us why you are interested in this particular position, and why Lifesum feels like the right place for you.

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of sex, transgender identity or expression, ethnicity, religion or other belief, disability, sexual orientation, or age.
